nodes.text: R0-VR, known as Rover, was an astromech droid owned by the former Jedi and saber-for-hire Ty Yorrick during the High Republic Era. Yorrick did not see a point in naming the astromech droid, viewing it, like her admin unit KL-03 and her starship, as nothing more than a tool, though admitted that it was useful. The astromech droid had the temperament of a loyal canine, tan plating, and three white sensors.

R0-VR was created by Cavan Scott for the Star Wars: The High Republic publishing initiative. It was introduced in the Characters of Star Wars: The High Republic video for Ty Yorrick, released on April 15, 2021, and was identified in Scott's novel The High Republic: The Rising Storm, published on June 29, 2021.

The droid was based on concept art for L3-37 from Solo: A Star Wars Story created by Jake Lunt Davies. Having seen the concept in The Art of Solo: A Star Wars Story, Scott liked the design and was determined to introduce it in The High Republic.
